name: SportsPreview
0:
”Alexa, ask Sports Preview for the Pirates preview.”
”Alexa, ask Sports Preview to read the Cubs and Pirates article.”
”Alexa, get the Yankees preview from Sports Preview.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sports preview
des: Stay on top of your favorite sports and teams with the Sports Preview Skill. Simply ask the Sports Preview Skill for the preview about the team or teams you're interested in. For the Cardinals, Giants, Jets, Kings, Panthers, and Rangers make sure you include the city name as well so Alexa knows which team you're talking about.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
